TITLE: Champagne, Ivory, & Antique White Silk Satin Brooch Bridal Bouquet
DESCRIPTION:
Elegance has found its definition in this champagne, ivory, and antique white medium Elegance On The Avenue brooch bridal bouquet. Eight inches wide and ten-and-a-half inches tall, 80 silk and satin roses are crowned with amazing rhinestone brooches, both vintage and vintage look. There is even a crown brooch! The handle is clad in antique white, French-wrapped in 3/8 inch wide ivory satin, and topped with a champagne silk ribbon. The champagne ribbon roses are silk; the ivory and antique white roses are premium double face satin. This bouquet is certainly not suitable for tossing! Please don't!  We will send you a free tossing bouquet with your purchase.

Customize this model to you wedding needs or have it shipped to you as is. See Shop Policies. Contact Elegance On The Avenue for more information. 

2013 Elegance On The Avenue

DESCRIPTION:
Looking for a Mother's Day gift? An elegant bridal party keepsake? An usual bouquet for your bridesmaids to carry? Consider our elegant tussie mussie holders with a bouquet in the colors of your choice. Gold or silver tone. Other styles available. Engraveable, too!

TITLE: Two Rose Boutonnierres with Skeleton Leaves
DESCRIPTION:
Shown here in pewter and champagne, these bouts have one large rose and one small rose. Also available with two small roses. This bout has a silver metallic skeleton leaf. Also available in gold metallic.

TITLE: Red & Black Rose Bridal Bouquet with Feathers and Pearls
DESCRIPTION:
SIxty red hand-rolled satin roses crowned with ivory pearls, sit upon red and black feathers to create a visually stunning bouquet. Bold and yet elegant, this bouquet is striking and memorable. The bouquet sits in a collar of feathers - red and black. The handle is clad in red, and French wrapped in sheer black, studded with black studs. This bouquet is a medium bouquet.
